name: Car Driving: Traffic Simulator
description:
A man’s dream of doing stunts fulfilled by his beloved son after his demise in a car crash, you are the driver to do amazing and thrilling stunts on sky high roads, show your driving and stunts skills by going through stunning roads, ramps, containers and more.

From first level to last this game is total fun, you will have unlimited fun while doing stunts and show world your absolute driving skills, drive different cars and earn more coins on each level.

Play and play to get more coins to buy more efficient and speedier cars so you can stunt flawlessly.

This game has some highlighting features like;

· Thrilling Ramp stunts
· More than 8 premium cars
· Rich Attractive Graphics
· Get coins on each level
· Very friendly user experience
· Eye catching User Interface.
developers: Hafiz Muhammad Farhan Mamoon Muhammad Mamoon Ul Haq
publishers: Hafiz Muhammad Farhan Mamoon Muhammad Mamoon Ul Haq
